property.name: logfeeder.config.files
property.description: Comma separated config files in grok format

property.name: logfeeder.metrics.collector.hosts
property.description: Metrics collector hosts for pushing metrics by Log Feeder

property.name: logfeeder.log.filter.enable
property.description: Enable Log filtering based on log level (INFO,ERROR,WARN etc.)

property.name: logfeeder.solr.config.interval
property.description: Interval to fetch filter config from Solr in sec

property.name: logfeeder.cache.enabled
property.description: Enable input cache for every monitored input file. The cache stores log lines, based on the data, duplications can be dropped.

property.name: logfeeder.cache.dedup.interval
property.description: If input cache is enabled, Log Feeder can drop any duplicated line during log processing, but only if the duplicated lines/messages are in the same interval (in milliseconds) with the original message/line.

property.name: logfeeder.cache.last.dedup.enabled
property.description: If last dedup is enabled for input cache, Log Feeder will drop every new line (message), which is the same as the last line.

property.name: logfeeder.cache.key.field
property.description: Key field, which will be used as keys in the Input cache. (by defalt, log_message represets the message part of processed data)

property.name: logfeeder.include.default.level
property.description: Include default Log Feeder Log Levels for Log Search. Used for bootstrapping the configuration only. (levels: FATAL,ERROR,WARN,INFO,DEBUG,TRACE)
